title: Welcome to my website!
text:
ORCID
  
  
    
     
  




Welcome to my website!
I am Debbie Seifert, a master’s student in biostatistics at Case Western Reserve University and bench scientist studying extracellular matrix in heart development and connective tissue disorders. I currently am the lab manager for Timothy Mead’s lab in Pediatric Cardiology. Since graduating in 2017, I have gained experience in a variety of molecular biology techniques, cell culture and animal husbandry. My goals are to branch more into the analysis of -omics data including proteomics and transcriptomics.
